## TFBSTools

So your options are 

1. Find the motifs that exist within the sequences.  So based on conservation 

source("http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("TFBSTools")

2. You can search through TFBS library using Z algorithm: 

[https://ivanyu.me/blog/2013/10/15/z-algorithm/](https://ivanyu.me/blog/2013/10/15/z-algorithm/)

Just create a loop.

## Looks like this package is the best

[ ] Read and understand

[Phstcons](http://compgen.cshl.edu/phast/phastCons-HOWTO.html)

## Motif Binding 

[http://web.cs.ucdavis.edu/~filkov/234/motiffinding.pdf](http://web.cs.ucdavis.edu/~filkov/234/motiffinding.pdf)
